animeDescription: Moments after an atomic bomb falls over Hiroshima, a secret Japanese submarine sails into battle against its American counterpart, and both are lost to history. Some fifty years later, a special UN task force sent to investigate unusual phenomena in Antarctica is threatened by a mysterious black cylinder.(Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Katayama, Kazuyoshi', 'Director, Storyboard'], ['Yasuhiko, Yoshikazu', 'Character Design'], ['Araki, Hideki', 'Key Animation'], ['Saitou, Hisashi', 'Key Animation']]
